instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: A1286 820-2915-A stuck at loading bar
threads.message:
Hi,

I have an A1286 820-2915-A that gets stuck at the middle ot the loading bar.

Alreay disable the GPU with medusa, removed the R8904 resistor, and cleaned the ME region, but same result.

Can you help?

threads.title: A1286 820-2915-A stuck at loading bar
threads.message:
Maybe BIOS disabling GPU wasn't successfully completed; try again.
You should get Lattice tool for this job; no need to remove the MLB from case.

threads.title: A1286 820-2915-A stuck at loading bar
threads.message:
Hi. Tks.
Don't know the  Lattice tool. Can you, please, provide a link to buy it?
